:Tankor, strika, thrust, jetstorm:
Tankor" i am tankor and the 3 others are strika,thrust and jetstorm. we would like to join you. we
noticed a new base on our scanners
--- Azure The Warrior <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> The new scanner suddenly came up with four sparks coming in direction of the 
> Shadow Destiny.
> 
> Gesper:
> Brother! We have four incoming sparks! Do I engage the defenses?
> 
> Belthassan:
> No! Of course not! They have not shown any hostility... yet. Computer, open 
> frequency to inbound robots.
> This is Commander Belthassan of the Tripredacus Strike Force Prophets. You 
> are currently arriving on Tripredacus territory. State your identity and 
> intentions. And tell me, how did you learn about us?
> 
> Melchana:
> Oh... I see, Bel, you are still playing your prudent act... Or is it your 
> traditionnal cowardice that makes you refrain to combat?
> 
> Belthassan's eyes widened with anger.
> Belthassan:
> Shut up, Soldier. I am in command here. Our weaponry is in working 
> condition, I agree, but we are not obliged to open fire on everything that 
> moves! That is not our mission!
> 
> Melchana contained what she was about to say. She was angered to be avoided 
> to fight, but she hoped they would open fire. She longed for battle...
>
